ABOUT/privacy/lbl: I DO NOT WANT YOUR DATA
ABOUT/privacy/li1: The only statistics tracked are the installations by Google analytics and visits to the public GitHub site.
ABOUT/privacy/li2: As soon you install this plugin it runs locally without sending statistics anywhere. There is no logging from my side of anything you do within this plugin and there never will be.
ABOUT/privacy/li3: I do not want your money, I do this in my spare time for fun and to make my own life and that of other's easier. There is no business model.
ABOUT/privacy/li4-1: There are no costs to cover: No servers, no hosting, no databases, everything runs on Google's, GitHub's and Reddit's infrastructure. Therefore you are
ABOUT/privacy/li4-3: the product and this is extension is free as in free beer.
ABOUT/privacy/li5: Everything runs locally. If you decide to execute a torrent search for an episode, a request goes from your computer to the search engine.

CHROMECAST/connect/hdr: You're all set now! Press Connect to start Casting!
CHROMECAST/connect/link: Go to the torrent remote page
CHROMECAST/connect/p2: and press the 'Play on Chromecast' button on any supported file format to stream it!
CHROMECAST/desc/p1: As a proof-of-concept, I have included this experimental ChromeCast support in this build. It's not done yet, so use at your own risk and don't come knocking at my door if your computer or ChromeCast dongle implodes.
CHROMECAST/instructions/hdr: Your local IP Address selected below
CHROMECAST/instructions/p1: The way I got Chromecast support to work is by piggy-backing on µTorrent's 'stream' function. This is awesome because you can push a video directly from your local computer without DuckieTV having to worry about transcoding or anything.
CHROMECAST/instructions/p2: The downside to this is that µTorrent embeds '127.0.0.1' as the default target for the streaming URL (On top of requiring HTTP authentication).
CHROMECAST/instructions/p3: To make sure I can open up a connection from your Chromecast dongle to this machine, you need to click the button below to select your local machine's IP. If you have more than one IP address, please select the one belonging to your WIFI connection.
CHROMECAST/notes/p1: A lot of the required UI for ChromeCast compliance is not working. You can only start a video, not stop it, you can't control the volume, you can't resume your session. This will all be finished in v0.6! (And
CHROMECAST/notes/p2: any help would be more than welcome
CHROMECAST/requirements/emb1: Click the 'Enable Web UI' checkbox in Preferences -> Advanced -> Web UI. Set the authentication to admin/admin (this will be configurable in the future)
CHROMECAST/requirements/emb2: I strongly advise only to allow access from 127.0.0.1 and your ChromeCast's IP.
CHROMECAST/requirements/li1: A ChromeCast dongle (which you already have since you see this page)
CHROMECAST/requirements/li2: µTorrent 3.3.x on Windows (3.4.x will not work, yet, downgrade if you want to experiment with this feature)
CHROMECAST/requirements/li3: µTorrent webUI enabled and configured for DuckieTV. For more info on how to set this up:
GOOGLEIMAGESjs/placeholder: Search IMDB for movies or series
IMDBjs/placeholder: Search IMDB for movies or series
QUERYMONITOR/please-wait/lbl: Please don't close DuckieTV until this is done
QUERYMONITORjs/close-tab-prompt/lbl: DuckieTV is still performing database operations. Do you really want to close this tab?
SERIE/mark-range/desc: You are now in range selection mode. Click on an episode to set that as the last episode you have watched. All episodes up to and including that will be marked as watched. Dismiss this notification
SERIECTRLjs/genre/list: Action,Adventure,Animation,Children,Comedy,Crime,Documentary,Drama,Family,Fantasy,Food,Game Show,History,Home and Garden,Horror,Mini Series,Mystery,News,No Genre,Reality,Romance,Science Fiction,Soap,Special Interest,Sport,Suspense,Talk Show,Thriller,Travel,Western
SERIEDETAILSjs/serie-delete-question/p1: Do you really want to delete
SERIESLIST/SEARCHING/addshow-start-typin: Start typing to search for shows to add to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/SEARCHING/connect-to-traktTV/: Connect DuckieTV to your Trakt.tv account
SERIESLIST/SEARCHING/error-with-trakttv/: There was an error contacting Trakt.TV, it might be down. Please try again later.
SERIESLIST/SEARCHING/import/btn: You can also import a backup
SERIESLIST/SEARCHING/series-no/desc:
Make DuckieTV work for you by adding the TV shows you like. Shows that are currently airing will appear on the calendar so that you can easily keep track of what is airing when.
 Just click on any of the trending shows below to add them or start typing above to manually search for a show
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/addshow-add-to-list/too: Add series to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/addshow-protip/lbl: Pro Tip: Hit [return] to add the first search result to your favorites
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/addshow-return-to-fav-l: Click to return to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/addshow-type-series-nam: Start typing to manually search for a show
SERIESLIST/TRENDING/addtrending-help-cli: Click a show to add it to your favorites
SERIESLIST/TRENDING/addtrending-help-ple: Please wait while loading Trakt.TV's Trending TV-Shows list
SETTINGS/BACKUP/backup/desc: Create a backup of your series / episodes / watched list.
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-doit/alert: Clicking this button will keep your series in sync with other browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-doit/btn: Keep series in sync between browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-dont/alert: Clicking this button will stop syncing your local series list with other browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-push/desc:
If you have used the Browser settings 'Sign in' to login to your Google Account,
 then hit this button to push your current series list into the cloud.
 Sign in on another browser with the same Google account and your series list will auto-magically be synced.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/background-opacity/aler: Selecting a button below will set the background image transparency to the chosen percentage.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/calendar-mode/alert: If you prefer the calendar to show only the current week/month, change it here
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/calendar-specials/alert: Choose to show or hide all the special episodes from the calendar
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/calendar-start/alert: Toggle between Sunday/Monday for start day of the week below
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/locale/alert: Select one of the following Locales to override the default.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-hide/alert: Clicking the button will hide the list of your most visited sites from the new tab page
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-hide/btn: Hide the Most Visited Sites from the new tab page
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-click/ale: Clicking the button below will make the Top Sites bar open when you click on it
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-click/btn: Require click to open Top Sites
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-hover/ale: Clicking the button below will make the Top Sites bar open when you hover over it
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-hover/btn: Require hover to open Top Sites
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-show/alert: Clicking the button will show a list of your 12 most visited sites on the new tab page
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-show/btn: Show Most Visited Sites in the new tab page
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-disable/al: Clicking the button below stops the auto-download process for torrents on your calendar.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-disable/bt: Disable auto-downloading torrents for aired shows
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-enable/ale:
Clicking the button below starts an automatic check every 2 hours that downloads torrents for episodes that have aired this week (haven't been downloaded already or marked as watched).
 It makes sure there are at least 250 seeders for the torrent and automatically uses your torrent quality preference.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-enable/btn: Enable auto-downloading torrents for aired shows
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autostop-disabled/alert: Clicking the button below requires you to click stop to end seeding finished torrents
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autostop-enabled/alert: Clicking the button below automatically stops the torrent when it reaches 100%
SETTINGS/TORRENT/default-provider/alert: Change your preferred torrent search provider below
SETTINGS/TORRENT/directory-folder-hide/a: Clicking the button below removes the 'open containing folder' button from the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
SETTINGS/TORRENT/directory-folder-show/a: Clicking the button below adds the 'open containing folder' button to the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
SETTINGS/TORRENT/functions-hide/alert: Clicking the button below will hide all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
SETTINGS/TORRENT/functions-show/alert: Clicking the button below enables all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
SETTINGS/TORRENT/kat-find-mirror/btn: Find a random mirror that supports Magnet links
SETTINGS/TORRENT/kat/desc: If for some reason Kickass Torrents is blocked in your territory, use the button below to automatically resolve a working mirror that supports magnet links. If you have a preferred server, you may input that as well.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/progressbar-hide/alert: Clicking the button below removes the progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
SETTINGS/TORRENT/progressbar-show/alert: Clicking the button below adds a progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
SETTINGS/TORRENT/quality-select/desc: If you select '720p' this will append '720p' to the default [seriesname] S[seasonnumber]E[episodenumber] search string.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/quality-select/desc2: This does not work as a 'minimum quality' search!
SETTINGS/TORRENT/quality/desc: Make a choice below to limit your episode searches to a specific quality.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/streaming-disabled/aler: Clicking the button below disables the streaming option while downloading torrents
SETTINGS/TORRENT/streaming-enabled/alert: Clicking the button below enables the streaming option while downloading torrents
SETTINGS/TORRENT/unsafe-proxies-disabled: Enabling this setting will allow you to use Torrent Proxies that proxy your magnet links (Which DuckieTV prevents by default to protect your privacy)
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/suggestions-fetche: Fetched Suggestions from Trakt.TV based on series your Trakt.TV profile:
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/suggestions/alert: Trakt.TV can also provide TV-Show suggestions based on shows you added to your profile. You can fetch them here
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/sync-import/btn: Import shows and watched episodes From Trakt.TV
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/sync/desc:
If you have a Trakt.TV account, you can have DuckieTV automatically fill itself by passing your credentials below.
 All your favorite shows and watched episodes will be fetched and added to your favorites list.

 If you enable Trakt.TV Sync all shows that you add and episodes that you mark watched in DuckieTV will automatically synced to your Trakt.TV account.
STORAGESYNCSERVICEjs/serie-deleted-remot: ' was deleted on another computer you're logged in on. Do you want to delete it here as well? (If you select no, it will be re-added to the remote computer on next sync)
TORRENTCLIENT/desc/p1: You need to be running µTorrent v3.3.x or
TORRENTCLIENT/desc/p3: You can now control your torrents straight from DuckieTV. Make sure µTorrent is running and accept the Pair request to enable auto-magic integration throughout the app
